body_html: What do you mean whole code? The import section and the function definitions don't have to be wrapped into the if protection. But you have to put these operations into the functions or the if protection.
body_text: What do you mean whole code? The import section and the function definitions don't have to be wrapped into the if protection. But you have to put these operations into the functions or the if protection.
body: What do you mean whole code? The import section and the function definitions don't have to be wrapped into the if protection. But you have to put these operations into the functions or the if protection.
